# cloudflare_zero_trust_lists (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cloudflare_zero_trust_lists" "example_zero_trust_lists" {
  account_id = "699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252"
  type = "SERIAL"
}
```
